# Name
Real Strongish Arithmetic

## Author
@justinforbes

## Overview
This seems secure enough for our needs.

```
#! /usr/bin/env python3
from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA
key = RSA.generate(4096, e=5)
msg = "welcome to BarSides!\nyour super secret flag is: XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX"
m = int(msg.encode().hex(), 16)
c = pow(m, key.e, key.n)
f = open("barrsa.txt", "w")
print("n = ",key.n, file=f)
print("e = ",key.e, file=f)
print("c = ",c, file=f)
n = 
e = 5
c = 
```
